attributes.action: The NHS needs more Physician-led Leadership
attributes.background: The NHS is run mainly by non-clinicians or clinicians with little formal training in leadership and business. Several studies show that the best quality hospitals in the world are run by clinicians. Natural born leaders with clinical credibility need sponsored formal training and then lead the NHS

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, if you would like all NHS hospitals in England to be physician-led, you could start a new petition asking for that.
